Text: Hi to everyone,sorry this is m2ts file not Mkv and also 192 kHz mind blowing!!!! Neil Young really knows how to get great sounding discs just had to put that in. Enjoy!!!
That's some serious hi res audio, thanks! I was wondering if you have that Supertramp Live in Paris 1979 disc. I have the DVD but would love to see it in higher resolution. Thanks again Marcus.

phase700b,yes i have Supertramp Live In Paris '79 has also got Great Audio dts Hd master 96kHz i also ripped it in m2ts file because when i did it in Mkv the audio was dts 96/24 bit which is still good.Once the Neil Young is done i will upload it.

Sounds great! You're right, DTS 96/24 still sounds super. It's crazy how long it took to release that. I don't think it was ever out on VHS, DVD or any other media until this year. It's kind of the Holy Grail for Supertramp fans.
phase700b,yes you're right only this year. I still listen to album on vinyl love it!!!
Same here. We still get the vinyl out every once in a while.

Thanks marcus100868!
And yes, vinyl are the best. I often listen to my collection and sound is insuperable.
